mapper.select:
select
distinct
from system_setting
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into system_setting (setting_id, setting_titile, setting_name, setting_value, setting_values, setting_data, setting_from, setting_sort, setting_description, setting_create_time) values (#{settingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{settingTitile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingValues,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
